// src/pages/ContactPage.jsx import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './ContactPage.css'; const ContactPage = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', subject: '', message: '' }); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log('Contact form submitted:', formData); alert('Thank you! We will contact you soon.'); setFormData({ name: '', email: '', subject: '', message: '' }); }; const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; return (
